title: Xu Jianping
text:
Xu Jianping (Chinese: 許建平; February 1, 1955- December 15, 2015) was a Chinese international <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. Throughout his career he played for <a href="Liaoning%20Whowin%20F.C.">Liaoning</a> and <a href="Dalian%20Shide%20F.C.">Dalian</a> and represented <a href="China%20national%20football%20team">China</a> in the <a href="1980%20AFC%20Asian%20Cup">1980 AFC Asian Cup</a>.
Death.
On 15 December 2015, Xu Jianping died of stomach cancer in Dalian ,aged 60.
